Name: Replica Duodrone
Languages: Modron, can understand Common but speaks only preprogrammed responses
Traits: Axiomatic Mind. The duodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions. Dismantlable. If the replica duodrone dies, its body falls into a pile of parts (gears, plates, screws, and wires), leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.
Actions: Multiattack. The duodrone makes two fist attacks or two javelin attacks. Fist. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage. Javelin. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.
